mapper.select: SELECT i.id, i.name, i.cost, i.spent_at, i.category_id, c.name AS category_name FROM items i JOIN categories c ON i.category_id = c.id WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM i.spent_at) = #{year} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM i.spent_at) = #{month} ORDER BY i.spent_at DESC
SELECT id, name, cost, spent_at FROM items WHERE id = #{id};
INSERT INTO items (name, cost, spent_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{cost}, #{spentAt}) RETURNING id, name, cost, spent_at
